sub_title: Project Manager at Philips | Scientist | Transformation & Change Leader | Medical Device | Healthcare Solutions
summary:
I am dynamic and results-oriented leader who brings industry knowledge and personal drive. I am a technical expert holding a PhD degree in Mechanical/Medical Engineering from Japan, Executive Master degree of Engineering Management, and a Bachelor degree in Biomedical Engineering.

I have a demonstrated history of broad experience in medical device industry in R&D, Quality, Project Management and Regulatory Affairs, an entrepreneurial-minded approach, and breadth of experience in a range of quality (Design Quality, Product Quality, Supplier quality, Quality Audits) and project management disciplines.

I led different quality medical device product developments from End to End (New Product Development and Software Development Lifecycle) and led different transformation projects related to business. Recently, I have led multiple cross functional projects from end-to-end and managed interdependencies and coordination across projects to ensure that information relating to project deliverables, risks and issues are effectively communicated between stakeholders. I defined and monitored key performance indicators that evaluate PMO deliverables and contribution to company strategies.

I have a strong professional background in Class I, II & III medical device including active medical devices. For example, cancer ablations (oncology portfolio), image guided therapy (X-Ray), electrophysiology device, lab automation systems (microbiology portfolio), surgical robotics, orthopedics/ergonomics, and dermatology intensive pulsed light.     

★Specialties: 

►Project Management: Waterfall, Agile (Scrum, Kanban, Metrics, User stories, Customer focus), Hybrid models. SAFe Scaled Agile for Lean Enterprise.
► Analytics/business process improvement.
►Regulatory Affairs: Technical Doc., DHF, Design Controls (EU MDR, FDA) and Post Market Surveillance.
►Quality Assurance: ISO 13485, ISO 9001, IEC 62304, QSR, QMS, Supplier Control, EU MDR/IVDR, TGA, GMP.
►Product Safety and Risk Management: ISO 14971 IEC 60101, IEC 60335. 

★Competences:
►Software: ARIS Management System, SPSS, Minitab, TrackWise, QlikView, DOORS, Windchill, QlikSense, SAP, Matlab, MS Project, Azure DevOps, JIRA, AutoCad, SolidWorks, PlanView Portfolio Management,  Team Foundation Server TFS. 
►Philips Six Sigma Green Belt, Black Belt (on going to obtain the certificate)
►Philips Project Management Practice Program

profile_positions.description:
Philips Healthcare Medical Systems | Best, Netherlands

►Lead, managed, coordinated cross-functional groups for the execution and release of Solution and Services Projects (In international context) & managed the constant communication with Local & Global Leadership. 
►Derived project portfolio and prioritization
►Supported in PMO standard tools and process. Train and coach project managers.
►Translated project charters into a comprehensive project plan (includes resources, costs, risk assessment and quality aspects) and led the project team to deliver on project and program objectives set by management. 
►Provided business management with regular project performance status, variances to plan and identification of corrective actions and reports.
►Executed the processes and standards in adherence to compliance with safety, regulatory- and environmental requirements as well as local laws, Philips General Business principles and policies.
►Orchestrated and Facilitated brainstorming workshop sessions with multiple experts and setup a structured transformation
► Applied agile, waterfall, and hybrid project management models for developing Scalable Services & Solutions.
► Have a good understanding how different deliverables/ swim-lanes are linked to each other in a project. 
► Have a solid project management experience (both Agile and waterfall, V model knowledge and able to link different development deliverables with different function).
►Led a multi disciplinary (R&D/ innovation like designers, operations, marketing, SME's) team.
►Managed complex dependencies, a range of dependent and related projects within our Service and Solutions Portfolio and in the wider Philips organization
► Worked in corporate culture in Philips, and used to work in a matrix organization.
►Followed set standard project methodologies to ensure delivery of a complete package considering all Philips Excellence elements (processes/systems, people, capabilities/learning, performance and structure)
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Project Manager (Healthcare Services and Solutions)

profile_positions.description:
Philips Healthcare (Medical Systems) | Best, Netherlands

►Worked closely with Services & Solutions Business and Project Leads to assist in the design and delivery of new services and solutions into the Businesses and Markets which position Q&R as an essential and valued business partner.
► Ensured solutions delivered from Services & Solutions programs are mapped to current and emerging Regulatory and Quality requirements.
► Ensured Q&R requirements are embedded in the new services programs and plans enabling the business to realize optimum results from investments bringing increased value to customers and Philips.
► Performed compliance risks assessments on new services & solutions projects as part of the planning process and to provide ongoing support throughout the lifecycle of the services.
► Ensured projects have all required Q&R deliverables completed on schedule.
► Ensured Services Quality Management System documents are effectively implemented (according to LEAN principles) and maintained as needed to ensure effectiveness and compliance.
► Supported regulatory and internal audits. Provided subject matter expertise during Regulatory and business partner inspections.
profile_positions.title: Quality & Regulatory Project Leader (Healthcare Services and Solutions)

profile_positions.description:
►Led a team of 4+ persons to assure the Quality and Safety of Innovative (Medical and Non-Medical) products for Beauty.
►Supported the PQMS ISO13485 process owner related to PMS EU MDR, Product Safety Risk Management procedures.
►Supported the activities for the design changes (MLD -Modify Launched Device) and sustaining activities specific to the product family in alignment with quality and compliance standards (Labeling, IFU, DFU, review of type plates and artworks launches).
►Ensured Risk Management quality (quality of UFMEA, DFMEA, PFMEA/HB-SRA)
►Managed PMS data for IPL Beauty. 
►Developed and implemented strategies to continuously improve capabilities in Post Market Surveillance systematic processes.
►Led all product safety/compliance related activities to ensure that the regulations and policies are fully and timely available and interpreted.
►Developed and implemented PMS trends visualization dashboards in TrackWise.
►Supported monitoring and detecting quality and safety signals regarding IPL product performance component defects and failure code trending. 
►Led quality related problem solving and root cause analysis during modification of design and manufacturing to drive and initiate improvements in new/current project, based on learnings/ feedback from earlier projects/ market (both Safety and Quality feedback).
►Collaborated with Risk Management and Clinical Affairs teams to determine the thresholds/action levels .
►Used Statistical Process Control for periodic monitoring. 
►Maintained PMS related KPIs (No. of open complaints per period Q&R dashboards, baseline improvements).
►Established guidelines and statistical trending procedures/protocols/methods based on the regulatory requirements
►Prepared trainings for PMS awareness and statistical methods implementation for trending and under reporting. 
►Instructed project teams about Quality Management System (Procedures/ Policies/ Guidelines/ tools), to ensure compliance to QMS, regulations and standards.
profile_positions.title: Quality Project Leader (Post Market and Product Launches)- Medical Device IPL & Skin Care Programs

profile_positions.description:
►Lead Complaint Management across business units (Safety Complaints, Quality Complaints, and Regulatory non-compliance complaints).
►Supported EU MDR deployments e.g. PMS, RM, QMS docs.
►Supported writing and updating Philips sites globally (local sites) procedures in Personal Health QMS.
►Supported QMS related activities (i.e. review procedures, work instructions, QMS 8D templates, documentation, and writing guidance).
►Prepared for external site audits (including DEKRA) to ISO and related standards (focus safety).
►Derived CAPA resolutions and SCAR handling.
►Vigilance Reporting to authorities and PMS (e.g. MIR, MDDRP).
►Ensured product safety throughout the product lifecycle, by taking part in the related processes execution, future process development, and deployment of new process versions and tools.
►Handled the communication of internal and external compliance issues.
►Ensured smooth and timely (potential safety) complaint management process execution, and have responsibilities in complaint evaluation, investigation, preparation of regulatory reports if applicable, and review of complaint investigation conclusions when proposed for closure.
►Monitored the process KPI’s and trending and pro-actively improved them.
►Supported the Personal Health Safety Lead on product risk management related activities throughout the product lifecycle.
►Supported future process development in areas of product safety risk management, post-market surveillance and complaint handling.
 ►Helped in handling challenges from surveillance authorities and other external parties.
►Perform deep dive spot checks on compliance evidence for critical products and as regular routine checks
profile_positions.title: Product Safety & Regulatory Compliance Manager (PQMS and Post Market Safety Trends PH)

profile_positions.description:
► Had strong expertise in the Quality Assurance field of (software) Design Control, Risk Management (design-, application- and process- FMEA) and Change Management during the New Product Development phase.
► Provided Quality Engineering representation on Product Development Teams.
► Initiated new/revised documentation and tracks through approval cycles and implementation.
► Participated on cross-functional teams to develop risk assessment.
► Develop physical and functional test methods to ensure specifications are met.
► Reviewed design verification and validation protocols and reports.
► Conducted and coordinated testing outlined in protocols and test methods.
► Provided technical direction during design transfer activities.
► Participated and provided input to training on department/division procedures, and policies.
► Participated in internal and supplier audits.
► Developed and implemented procedures to provide easy to follow instructions.
► Understood and followed company procedures on regulatory requirements.
► Provided positive example and actively promote compliance to all standards.
► Maintained a professional working relationship with internal and external customer and support staff.
► Prepared and present project updates and technical discussions.
► Involved in both routine as project driven quality assurance task during the entire product life cycle (design, production, servicing), but primary focused on NPD.
► Familiar with software and hardware development processes, product and process validation, ISO 13485 and FDA / 21CFR820.
► Cyber security risk management (Product Security QA)
► Change control, change requests from CAPA, and quality notifications.
profile_positions.title: Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
►Had QMS Training ISO 9001 [Non-MD QMS]
►Supported the Supplier Audits in Philips internally. 
►Supported FCR, EOL testing, compliance, IEC 61672.
►Research & development and innovation & design.
►Provided Trainings for product development and design for interns. 
►Technology and Knowledge Scouting for equipment.
►Establish marketing landscaping for modules.
►Conducted test methods for competitor’s analysis.
►Participated in supplier audits for parts and designed new test methods for evaluating the supplier parts.
►Product development within a new category of products
►Product development and function creation in broad field of engineering, including biomechanics, heating, cooling, and fluid dynamics.
►Developing concepts for new products or product functions, together with consumer marketing management.
►Concept Developing and Prototyping. 
►Applied Lean quick learning cycles in product development. 
►Statistical data analysis and experimental testing. 
►Experienced working with remote teams and remote communication.
►Had the knowledge with the problem solving with quality tools such as 6-sigma/ 8-D/ FMEA / 5 Why.
profile_positions.title: Product Development Engineer - Quality & Risk

profile_positions.description:
Postdoctoral (Project Leader)
University of Twente | Enschede, Netherlands
Radboud University Medical Center | Nijmegen, Netherlands
Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Mathematics & Computer Science

► Supervised a project entitled: MRI-Guided Irreversible Electroporation IRE (IGT: Image Guided therapies).
► Incorporated Lean Six Sigma in Robotics Automation Process.
► Initiated NPI (or NPD) plan partially (Define and Develop phases) to introduce a smart robotics needles insertion device compatible with MRI to perform IRE.
► Investigated the design features and characteristics and turned them into a more defined form by implementing 3D Models and Concept Level Drawings.
► Assisted as an R&D to provide solutions for doctors that advance the MRI-Guided Irreversible Electroporation (IRE) focal cancer therapy.
► Investigated the process optimization and redesign for the MRI-Guided IRE.
► Launched lean thinking sessions for the project about SPC tools, Design of Experiments (DOE), and Taguchi Optimization.
► Supervised both Master students and PhD students to conduct different types of experiments to solve the complexity of the Irreversible Electroporation treatment.
► Conducted different medical Multiphysics numerical simulations (Thermal and Electrical Physics) to estimate the Irreversible Electroporation treatment efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher IGT (Project Leader R&D/Quality)

profile_positions.description:
Scientific Researcher (Ph.D. Researcher)
Kyushu University | Fukuoka, Japan
Department of Mechanical Engineering 

► Collaborated with Hitachi Medicals (Japan) and Galil Medicals (USA) R&D engineers. 
► Achieved KORPAN Award of Gold Medal in recognition of outstanding contribution towards the advancements of Cryomedicine by the Japan Society for Low Temperature Medicine, Japan.
► Provided useful information for clinicians to operate the minimal invasive Cryosurgery and to increase the quality of the treatment. 
► Attended Introduction Course to Japanese Medical Device QMS requirements (ISO 13485:2003 Medical Devices) and (Japanese Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare (MHLW) Ministerial Ordinance 169, 2004). 
► Redesigned Cryosurgery operation plans.
► Utilized Matlab and Python to implement a GUI for clinicians to support them during Cryosurgery.
► Validated successfully the cooling performance of a widely used Joule–Thomson Cryoprobe by scientific experiments and numerical modelling. 
► Investigated the factors affecting the efficiency of the Cryosurgery cancer treatment using Design of Experiments (DOE) and Hypothesis testing. 
► Conducted different Multiphysics COMSOL models to improve the CryoHitTM system modalities.
► Supervised Master Students Projects related to Bioheat and Mass Transfer. 
► Published 4 publications in thermal and medical journals in international and Japanese recognized journals. 
► Wrote about 7 scientific technical reports to the R&D team in Hitachi Medicals and clinicians in Kyoto University Hospital.
profile_positions.title: Scientific Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Lecturer
Islamic University of Gaza | Palestine 
Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering

► Instructed different topics in the area of management industrial engineering such as: 
     o	Lean and Six Sigma | Advanced Statistics |  Quality Control | Operations Research.
► Coached new students (who are members at IISE office) in the Six Sigma.
► Supervised BSc. students graduation projects in topics related to process modelling and improvement in industry. 
► Participated in a managerial case study combined a data envelopment analysis (DEA) with the theory of constraints (TOC) to a polyvinyl chloride (PVC) pipes’ production line. The project enhanced the number of the PVC pipes that are produced annually by 21%, increased the line throughput from 0.3 pipe/min to 1.15 pipe/min and increased the system utilization by 19%.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Research Assistant
University of Jordan | Jordan
Department of Industrial Engineering

► Assisted in educational duties for Quality and Project Management for the Industrial Engineering students.
► Supported the students with the required computer software (e.g. Minitab and Quality Companion) in dealing with different problems in healthcare management, continuous quality improvements, lean thinking, optimization, decision making, DMAIC, and IDOV. 
► Supervised BSc. Graduation Projects in different management topics such as: Lean thinking, Quality Control, Process Simulation and Statistics.
► Developed a new Emergency Department work-system that helped in improving the performance of an emergency department, which resulted in reducing patient’s average waiting time and improving the nurses’ utilization.
► Supported a project to develop Discrete event simulation model (DES) to redesign the existing Emergency Department processes.
► A team member of a Design For Six Sigma (DFSS) project in an Emergency Department. DMADV resulted in reducing waiting time by 61% and length of stay by 34%. 
► Supported a research on Customer Complaint Management System (CCMS).
► Participated in multidisciplinary projects in Industrial Engineering and Quality areas (1) Evaluating the Governmental Projects Excellence in AJMAN Emirate using IPMA and TQM Criteria, UAE. (2) Productivity Improvement in Appliance Manufacturing, Jordan. (3) Applying the statistical process quality control to evaluate the rejection specimens in the hospital main laboratory, Jordan.
► Published more than 7 publications in quality, optimization and decision making in multidisciplinary applications.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Biomedical Quality Engineer (Associate)
Asia for Medical Equipment | Jordan

► Developed Failure Mode and Effect Analysis (FMEA) to analyze failures of the laser equipment installation process.
► Installed more than 30 medical laser equipment in Jordan from DEKA laser (Italy) and Jeisys Medical (South Korea).
► Assured the quality inspection process and the acceptance checking during the installation and delivery.
► Trained clinicians to use the hair removal laser equipment optimally considering the complexity of number of laser shots and energy required.  
► Planned the layout facility of the new dental clinics.
► Initiated a six sigma project DMADV to the installation, delivery, and maintenance service processes included:  Process Mapping, Complaint Analysis (CAPA), SPC tools, Cause and Effect Ishikawa Diagrams (Root Causes) and PDCA.
► Wrote maintenance and installation reports to direct supervisor.
► Attended conferences and exhibitions of our company products.
► Contributed to project plans as a team member.
profile_positions.title: Biomedical Quality Engineer (Associate)

profile_positions.description:
Biomedical Engineer (Intern)
Unity Medical Supplies Est. | Jordan
Tenders Department

► Attended a training course on ISO 13485 QMS.
► Applied data analysis (hypothesis testing, DOE analysis, linear regressions) to the delivery process of medical devices to MOH.
► Audited the product specifications sheets of the company’s Tender Management System.
► Checked the delivery and inspection of Medical Equipment 
► Attended a maintenance Training on Nihon Kohden Medical Devices Products (e.g. Patient Monitors, ECG,  and Defibrillators).
profile_positions.title: Biomedical Engineer (Intern)
